translation.en: [Delaney Henderson] My dad came home one night and said, "Delaney, you need to turn on the news."
translation.it: Mio padre una sera è rientrato dicendo: "Delaney, accendi il notiziario".

translation.en: I remember turning on the news and hearing about this girl and her name was Audrie Pott.
translation.it: Ricordo di averlo fatto e di aver sentito parlare di Audrie Pott.

translation.en: And I remember thinking to myself, "I need to talk to her."
translation.it: Ho pensato: "Devo parlarle".

translation.en: And my dad looked at me and he said, "You know, she committed suicide."
translation.it: Ma mio padre mi ha guardato e ha detto: "Si è suicidata".

translation.en: I know... I know the exact feeling she felt.
translation.it: So bene cosa deve aver provato.

translation.en: Even after my assault,
translation.it: Dopo lo stupro,

translation.en: I still go through it sometimes of just self-shame and,
translation.it: a volte mi capita ancora di vergognarmi

translation.en: you know, all these people are right, what they're saying about me.
translation.it: e di pensare che quelle persone dicano il vero su di me.

translation.en: She had only been going through this for a week and had gotten so bad.

translation.it: Avrei voluto poterle parlare

translation.en: and let her know that I was there.
translation.it: e farle sapere che le ero vicina.

translation.en: That I'm going through what she's going through.

translation.en: And my dad was like, "You know, but sometimes, like, it's just too late."
translation.it: Mio padre ha detto: "A volte, è troppo tardi".

translation.en: I'm just lucky because it didn't work.
translation.it: La mia fortuna è stata non farcela.

translation.en: When I tried to kill myself, it didn't work.
translation.it: Quando ho tentato il suicidio, non ha funzionato.

translation.en: And I remember thinking afterwards, "Why didn't I take more pills?"
translation.it: Dopo ho pensato: "Perché non ho preso più pillole?"

translation.en: Like, the assault and the rape happened,

translation.en: but it was the aftereffect, I think, that was so much worse.
translation.it: ma il peggio è venuto dopo.

translation.en: I mean, there was pictures forwarded all over Facebook, all over Twitter.
translation.it: Hanno postato foto su Facebook e Twitter.

translation.en: because these threats are getting so bad that we're afraid for your life."
translation.it: perché le minacce sono gravi e temiamo per la tua vita".

translation.en: What about these? These too, right?

translation.en: [Delaney] Now, we are finally moving to Florida.

translation.en: I mean, we can't get any farther than that.

translation.en: We're going from the Pacific Ocean to the Atlantic Ocean.

translation.en: I wish that someone had contacted me when I had needed it, you know?

translation.en: Even just to send me a Facebook message.

translation.it: "Compiendo un'ingiustizia ai danni di un membro della comunità,

translation.en: in a teenage rape investigation in Maryville, Missouri, that has grabbed headlines nationwide.

translation.en: [Daisy] I was excited.
translation.it: Ne sono felice.

translation.en: I felt like I was going to be able to work with someone
translation.it: Finalmente potrò collaborare con qualcuno

translation.en: who was actually excited about this case and willing to put forth a real effort.
translation.it: veramente disposto ad andare in fondo alla questione.

translation.en: [Fall] Twenty years ago, we built a thousand-acre lake
translation.it: Vent'anni fa abbiamo creato un lago di 400 ettari

translation.en: that has become an area of recreational draw
translation.it: divenuto punto di ritrovo ricreativo,

translation.en: and one of the 100 best fishing places in the country and...

translation.en: Does anybody come and report that? No.
translation.it: Qualcuno ne ha parlato? No.

translation.en: But this comes up, and here it unloads on you.
translation.it: Ma esce una notizia come questa e finisci alla gogna.

translation.en: [Jean Peters Baker] Whenever you get a call and someone says
translation.it: Quando arriva una telefonata, mi dicono che al telefono c'è il giudice tal dei tali.

translation.en: that judge so-and-so is calling,
translation.it: mi dicono che al telefono c'è il giudice tal dei tali.

translation.en: you hang up on that phone call you're on and you take the judge's call.
translation.it: Allora prendo la telefonata e rispondo al giudice in questione.

translation.en: and then he tells me he's from Nodaway County. And I just...
translation.it: PROCURATORE SPECIALE …mi ha detto il nome e di chiamare dalla contea di Nodaway…

translation.en: My heart sunk a little bit, because I thought... [sighs] "Oh, I bet I know why you're calling."
translation.it: Mi si è stretto il cuore. Ovviamente sapevo perché stesse chiamando.

translation.en: When the case is built on the testimony of the victim,
translation.it: STATO DEL MISSOURI, QUERELANTE CONTRO MATTHEW B. BARNETT, IMPUTATO Quando il caso si basa sulla testimonianza della vittima,

translation.en: those can be very, very hard.
translation.it: le cose si fanno complicate.

translation.en: And so, I tried to collect additional evidence.
translation.it: Così ho cercato di raccogliere ulteriori prove.

translation.en: There was nothing about the rape kit

translation.en: I had available to me that really gave us another "a-ha" moment.
translation.it: mi ha fornito una qualche rivelazione.

translation.en: We tried to go back and find the phone.
translation.it: Abbiamo cercato di recuperare il telefono.

translation.en: You know, "Did it exist? Did it exist at one time?
translation.it: "È davvero esistito?

translation.en: Could we still get it?"
translation.it: È possibile rintracciarlo?"

translation.en: We were unsuccessful in that regard.
translation.it: Ma non ci siamo riusciti.

translation.en: [interviewer] What was the state of the case when it was handed to you?
translation.it: A che punto era il caso, quando le è stato affidato?

translation.en: In your professional opinion?
translation.it: Secondo la sua opinione professionale?

translation.en: I just don't think, um, I want to answer that question.
translation.it: Non credo di voler rispondere a questa domanda.

translation.en: So, at the end of that investigation,
translation.it: Al termine delle indagini,

translation.en: I believed that we got as far as the evidence would take us.
translation.it: sapevo che le prove a disposizione non avrebbero potuto condurci oltre.

translation.en: Sometimes, that doesn't tell a full story.
translation.it: A volte non si arriva mai al quadro completo.

translation.en: But in this case,
translation.it: Ma, nella fattispecie,

translation.en: I believed the charge that I was able to go forward on...
translation.it: credevo che, per le imputazioni con le quali potevo procedere

translation.en: I knew that I had the evidence to try.
translation.it: sapevo di avere prove sufficienti.

translation.en: Mr. Barnett pled guilty to endangering the welfare of a child
translation.it: Barnett si è dichiarato colpevole per il reato di maltrattamento di minore

translation.en: in the second degree.
translation.it: di secondo grado.

translation.en: In this case,
translation.it: In questo caso,

translation.en: there was insufficient evidence to go forward on a sexual assault.
translation.it: non avevamo abbastanza prove per dimostrare la violenza sessuale.

translation.en: These are very hard cases.
translation.it: Sono casi molto difficili.

translation.en: The facts are hard, often.
translation.it: I fatti stessi spesso sono difficili.

translation.en: The legal requirements can be very hard. And very hard to meet.
translation.it: A volte è dura rientrare nei requisiti giuridici.

translation.en: [Melinda] When... Jean Baker came out with the verdict,
translation.it: Quando Jean Baker ha comunicato il verdetto,

translation.en: it just was really stressful.
translation.it: è stato stressante.

translation.en: We were waiting to see what was gonna happen,
translation.it: Aspettavamo con ansia di sapere cosa sarebbe successo,

translation.en: what they were gonna find in the investigation, and if anything was gonna be done.
translation.it: i risultati delle indagini, e se avrebbero fatto qualcosa.

translation.en: So, when it finally came out that it was just gonna be probation,
translation.it: Quando abbiamo saputo della libertà vigilata,

translation.en: it was hard to deal with.
translation.it: non è stato facile da accettare.

translation.en: [White] As near as I can tell, the boys are the only ones that have decided
translation.it: Che io sappia, i ragazzi sono stati i soli ad aver deciso

translation.en: that they wanna put this behind them, and try to move on with their lives,
translation.it: di lasciarsi tutto alle spalle e andare avanti con le proprie vite

translation.en: and try to make something of themselves. They...
translation.it: e fare qualcosa per se stessi.

translation.en: I think that all of them, with the exception of the juvenile,
translation.it: Tutti loro, tranne il minore

translation.en: who's still in high school, and I think that he's doing fine,
translation.it: che è ancora al liceo e credo se la stia cavando bene,

translation.en: but I think all of the boys are, um, going to college,
translation.it: vanno al college,

translation.en: and working, and trying to do better.
translation.it: lavorano e cercano di migliorarsi.

translation.en: And this is one of the real fatal flaws of our society.
translation.it: Questo è uno dei peggiori difetti della nostra società.

translation.en: Is that it's always... it's always the boys. It's not always the boys.
translation.it: Incolpare sempre i ragazzi. Non sono sempre loro i colpevoli.

translation.en: The girls... Girls have as much culpability in this world as boys do.
translation.it: Anche le ragazze hanno la loro dose di colpa.

translation.en: So, you know, everybody has to take their part of it.
translation.it: Ognuno deve prendersi le proprie responsabilità.

translation.en: And everybody has to do better.
translation.it: Tutti devono fare di più.

translation.en: [interviewer] I absolutely agree.
translation.it: Concordo in pieno.

translation.en: In this particular case, though, the crimes were committed by boys.
translation.it: Ma in questo caso i crimini sono stati commessi dai ragazzi.

translation.en: Were they? [laughs]
translation.it: Davvero?

translation.en: [Daisy] After the charges were dropped,
translation.it: Cadute le accuse,

translation.en: it was just really one thing after another.
translation.it: si sono susseguite le difficoltà.

translation.en: Like, all the drama with the social media, and then I was getting in fights.
translation.it: I social network, gli scontri personali.

translation.en: I hated going to school, I hated going out in public.
translation.it: Detestavo andare a scuola o mostrarmi in pubblico.

translation.en: I couldn't handle any more.
translation.it: Non ce la facevo più.

translation.en: I wanted to fight back with everyone,
translation.it: Volevo reagire

translation.en: and I wanted to, you know, I wanted them to believe me.
translation.it: e che la gente mi credesse.

translation.en: You already have this wound just ripped clean open
translation.it: Ti senti già ferita, esposta

translation.en: and you're vulnerable and you're going through a really hard time,
translation.it: e vulnerabile. Stai passando un momento orribile

translation.en: and to have all these people attacking you on top of it,
translation.it: e sentirti attaccata da tante persone

translation.en: it almost makes the bullying seem more extreme.
translation.it: peggiora il bullismo a cui sei sottoposta.

translation.en: You begin to believe that these bad things they're saying about you are actually true.
translation.it: Inizi a credere che le brutte cose che dicono di te siano vere.

translation.en: So, your image of yourself completely changes

translation.en: and you kind of become a shell of yourself.

translation.en: You almost see that, you know, doing away with yourself is the only way to fix things,
translation.it: Cominci a pensare che l'unica alternativa sia farla finita,

translation.en: which isn't the truth at all,
translation.it: il che non è vero,

translation.en: but it's all you can truly see when you're sitting in a dark corner
translation.it: ma è difficile vedere altre soluzioni quando ti ritrovi al buio

translation.en: and you're not looking around at the light.
translation.it: e non vedi la luce intorno.

translation.en: [Melinda] Afterwards, with the backlash,
translation.it: Le ripercussioni successive

translation.en: we started having issues with vandalism of the house.
translation.it: sono stati gli atti vandalici contro casa nostra.

translation.en: We had issues with people threatening to beat up the kids.

translation.en: It was just...

translation.en: really, really hard to believe.
translation.it: a dir poco assurda.

translation.en: Because we still had the house here,

translation.en: and I thought, at least, the kids would be safe.

translation.en: like when you're writing or typing a sentence, a semicolon means, like, that's not the end.

translation.en: Okay, well, basically, when I was 16, uh, my parents went out of town

translation.en: and I had two girlfriends that were supposedly spending the night.

translation.en: two of which I had never met before.

translation.en: we were all smoking weed and I had never done that before.

translation.en: After a while, I remember everything just got really, like, uneven.

translation.en: [sighs] That part's really hard.

translation.en: [Ella] I don't really remember much, but...

translation.en: half-frozen and trying to make it to the door.

translation.en: almost like I was lucid dreaming, that my dad was just like,

translation.en: "Hey, you gotta get up and go inside." But no one really believed me.

translation.en: [Delaney] It's unbelievable what people will say about you and what, you know,

translation.en: and what I'm still doing is right, so, um...

translation.en: I'm glad I have all of you guys here today. [chuckles]

translation.en: [Charlie] I think Daisy's coping with things a lot better.

translation.en: We've gotten her into some intensive counseling.

translation.en: [Charlie and boys] Dear Lord.

translation.it: convinto che non avessero possibilità, che li avrei fatti scappare.

translation.en: -Go. -[boy] Run it out! Run it out!

translation.en: [Charlie] I don't think I ever thought about teaching them greater life lessons

translation.en: until I had heard a couple boys

it wasn't right and...

translation.en: [man] Daisy Coleman is a recipient of an athletic scholarship

translation.en: from Missouri Valley College.
translation.it: dal Missouri Valley College.

translation.en: The class of 2015 awards an honorary diploma to Audrie Taylor Pott.

translation.en: I was way too afraid to report it

translation.en: because I was bullied, I was ostracized, I was threatened.
translation.it: perché ero vittima di bullismo, ero ostracizzata e minacciata.

translation.en: I found my voice when I decided to show my face in my first interview.
translation.it: Ho trovato il coraggio mostrando il viso nella prima intervista.

translation.en: The guys recorded and took photos of the sexual assault,
translation.it: Quei ragazzi hanno ripreso e scattato foto della violenza sessuale

translation.en: and then posted them online.

translation.en: Finally, after being misunderstood for years
translation.it: Dopo non essere stata compresa per anni

translation.en: and going through so much pain and absolutely hating myself,
translation.it: e aver sopportato tanto dolore, tanto da arrivare a odiarmi,

translation.en: I decided that, if no one's gonna talk about it, then I will.
translation.it: finalmente ho deciso che se nessuno vuole parlarne, lo farò io.

translation.en: Since my friends didn't stand up for me, I urge other people to speak out,
translation.it: I miei amici non mi hanno sostenuta, quindi sprono gli altri a parlare.

translation.en: because you can't ignore an army of voices.
translation.it: Non si può ignorare un esercito di voci.

translation.en: And I would like to see people stand up for others who have been assaulted.
translation.it: Vorrei che più persone sostenessero le vittime di violenze sessuali.

translation.en: Because the words of our enemies aren't as awful as the silence of our friends.
translation.it: Perché le parole dei nemici feriscono meno del silenzio degli amici.

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.it: Grazie.
